text: Baluna [1], â€˜tomadera upara [2] ba nica theke sasti pathate [3],ba tomaderake bibhinna sandehapurna dale bibhakta karate ba eka dalake an'ya dalera sangharsera asbada grahana karate [4] tini (allaha) saksama.â€™ Dekhuna,amara ki rupe bibhinnabhabe ayatasadamuha bibrta kari yate tara bhalobhabe bujhate pare
